modName: Faster GET UP STAND UP back anim Beta
summary: Moved to finale mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17491]Faster GET UP STAND Up animation vanila friendly[/url]
descriptionHtml:
[size=13][color=red]This mod is officially out of beta. Finally I was able to find help to fix small minor, but to me annoying issues. The savior is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3324848]Bergzore[/url]. And thanks to him I can finally after a year move this file out of beta. Please go to the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17491]main mod page[/url] for update to version [i][b]2.0. As always if you like the mod don\'t forget to endorse it ;) [/b][/i][/color][/size]

[spoiler]
This mod is a simple editing of the stand up get up front animation to be twice as fast or as close as it was possible.

Should you want to make this player only animation right now a solution is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14871]here[/url]

The youtube video bellow shows how [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17491]this mod[/url] was made [color=orange]This mod is just a addon and Beta test. Later will be added to the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17491]main[/url] file[/color]

[youtube]ffQhxXxngro&feature=player_embedded[/youtube]

Woohoo a nice review from [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/SaioTV]SaioTV[/url] :)  Thank youuuu. You should definitely check out his YouTube channel. He has a TON of very good mod reviews ;)

[youtube]LTZKjTAfXNs&feature=player_embedded[/youtube]

History
V1.0
Stand up, get up animation when player falls on his/her face for some reason.

[color=red] My other mods: [/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14811]Jaredschons and D13 Advanced Dwarven all in one Bows Standalone Craftable[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11860]Friendly Ebony upgrade[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7590]Skyrim Leveled items can level up Unique upgrade balanced[/url]
Mod I coded and are definitely worth to check out:
The Super awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6952]Lost Secrets of Daedric Gods project[/url] textures by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3737399]CzuCzuRender[/url]
and the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6836]Lordly Armor[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=964515]Rhage87[/url]


How to and Credits:
[url=http://students.autodesk.com] 3D Studio Max[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15238]Tutorial[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3368538]aeonflux88[/url] Thank you so much it wouldn\'t be possible without it.
Youtube :)
[/spoiler]
author: DarkAngel13

files.name: faster stand up front animation
files.changelogHtml: Stand up, get up animation when player falls on his/her back for some reason.
